gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 116, Hawks 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers win their seventh straight game as they defeat the Hawks, 116-95. Donovan Mitchell recorded 18 points, six rebounds and eight assists for the Cavaliers, while Sam Merrill added 18 points (5-14 3pt. FG) and six assists in the victory. Dejounte Murray tallied 24 points, nine rebounds and five assists for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Cavaliers improve to 25-15 on the season, while the Hawks fall to 18-24.
